page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content:
St Andrews School
There is a lot of teaching and learning going on in Chedworth. The thing people think of first is the school, where we get taught how to read and write, use the computer and lots more things. There are two classes in the school and four teachers; one who hears children read, one who comes in on a Friday while our other teacher does the paper work and of course the two permanent teachers.We have 51 children in the school which is not really very many, quite a lot of children go to private schools. We have two computers in school and a dining hall, staff room, two big classrooms, a library, kitchen and a PE or assembly room. A staff room is where the staff do their marking while we go out to play. Our
